001package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import androidx.room.Update;
008import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.Row;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity.RowStitch;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
011import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
012import java.util.Collection;
013import java.util.List;
014
015/**
016 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link RowStitch} entity instances. {@code CREATE}, {@code INSERT},
017 * {@code UPDATE}, and {@code DELETE} operations are implemented as ReactiveX {@link Single} tasks,
018 * which execute on subscription; some {@code SELECT} tasks are implemented using {@link LiveData}
019 * queries, which execute on observation, or (if already being observed) on Room-based updates to
020 * the underlying tables.
021 */
022@Dao
023public interface RowStitchDao {
024
025  /**
026   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
027   * {@code rowStitch} into the database and invokes the subscribing {@link Consumer} with the
028   * auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
029   *
030   * @param rowStitch {@link RowStitch} instance to be inserted.
031   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code rowStitch} into the
032   * database.
033   */
034  @Insert
035  Single<Long> insert(RowStitch rowStitch);
036
037  /**
038   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts a
039   * {@link Collection} of {@link RowStitch} into the database and invokes the subscribing
040   * {@link Consumer} with the auto-generated primary key value of the inserted record.
041   *
042   * @param stitches {@link Collection} of {@link RowStitch} to be inserted.
043   * @return {@link Single} of a {@link List}  inserted {@code stitches}.
044   */
045  @Insert
046  Single<List<Long>> insert(Collection<RowStitch> stitches);
047
048  /**
049   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
050   * {@code stitch} to the database.
051   *
052   * @param stitch {@link RowStitch} instance to be updated.
053   * @return {@link Single} that will update {@code stitch} to the database.
054   */
055  @Update
056  Single<Integer> update(RowStitch stitch);
057
058  /**
059   * Queries the database about a particular {@code rowStitch} in a certain ordinal position.
060   *
061   * @param position A position within a {@link Row}.
062   * @return {@link LiveData} of the {@link RowStitch} in said ordinal {@code position}.
063   */
064  @Query("SELECT * FROM row_stitch WHERE ordinal_position = :position")
065  LiveData<RowStitch> select(int position);
066
067  /**
068   * Queries the database for all the {@link RowStitch} instances in a particular {@link Row}.
069   *
070   * @param rowId Id for the {@link Row} in question.
071   * @return {@link LiveData} of the {@link List} of stitches in that {@link Row}.
072   */
073  @Query("SELECT * FROM row_stitch WHERE row_id = :rowId ORDER BY ordinal_position")
074  LiveData<List<RowStitch>> selectForRow(long rowId);
075
076}
